heading: Piano trios.
general-note: Here are entered compositions not in a specific form or of a specific type for piano, violin and cello..

Compositions not in a specific form or of a specific type for piano and two other solo instruments are entered under. Trios,. followed by medium of performance, e.g.. Trios (Piano, clarinet, cello); Trios (Piano, violins (2))..
Compositions not in a specific form or of a specific type for three pianos are entered under the heading. Piano ensembles..
Compositions not in a specific form or of a specific type for three players at one piano are entered under the headings. Piano music (5 hands). or. Piano music (6 hands)..
Works on ensembles that perform piano trios are entered under. Piano trios (Musical groups)..
